overview: Marc Bolan, an enigma, a man whose quest for fame inspired a generation, but who was the real Marc Bolan? Marc Bolan: Destined For Fame, follows the spectacular career of Britain's first and biggest Glam Rocker. Told by some of Marc’s closest friends we explore the highs (and lows) of Bolan’s career, from the height of Glam-rock to Marc’s final days, in an effort to truly understand, who was the real Marc Bolan?
title: Marc Bolan: Destined For Fame
